00005 CFoob::CFoob(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y, std::vector<CPlayer>& Player):
00006 CObject(p_map,x,y, OBJ_FOOB),
00007 m_Player(Player)
00008 {
00009  state = FOOB_WALK;
00010  dir = RIGHT;
00011  animframe = 0;
00012  animtimer = 0;
00013  OnSameLevelTime = 0;
00014  blockedr = 0;
00015  canbezapped = 1;
00016  dead = 0;

00019 void CFoob::process()
00020 {
00021  bool onsamelevel;
00022 
00023  if (state==FOOB_DEAD) return;
00024 
00025  if (!hasbeenonscreen) return;
00026 
00027  if ( (HealthPoints <=0 && state != FOOB_EXPLODE) || touchPlayer)
00028  {
00029   if (state != FOOB_EXPLODE)
00030   {
00031    animframe = 0;
00032    animtimer = 0;
00033    state = FOOB_EXPLODE;
00034    g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_YORP_DIE, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00035   }
00036  }
00037 
00038  // find out if a player is on the same level as the foob cat
00039  onsamelevel = false;
00040 
00041  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00042  for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00043  {
00044   if ( (it_player->getYUpPos() >= getYUpPos()-(2<<CSF)) &&
00045    (it_player->getYDownPos() <= getYDownPos()+(1<<CSF)) )
00046   {
00047    onsamelevel = true;
00048    SpookedByWho = it_player->m_index;
00049    break;
00050   }
00051  }
00052 
00053  switch(state)
00054  {
00055  case FOOB_WALK:
00056   // if player is on the same level for FOOB_SPOOK_TIME, run away
00057   if (onsamelevel)
00058   {
00059    if (OnSameLevelTime > FOOB_SPOOK_TIME)
00060    {
00061     state = FOOB_SPOOK;
00062     spooktimer = 0;
00063     if (onscreen) g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_YORP_DIE, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00064    }
00065    else OnSameLevelTime++;
00066   }
00067   else OnSameLevelTime = 0;
00068 
00069   if (dir == RIGHT)
00070   {  // walking right
00071    sprite = FOOB_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME + animframe;
00072    if (blockedr)
00073    {
00074     dir = LEFT;
00075    }
00076    else
00077    {
00078     xinertia = FOOB_WALK_SPEED;
00079    }
00080   }
00081   else
00082   {  // walking left
00083    sprite = FOOB_WALK_LEFT_FRAME + animframe;
00084    if (blockedl)
00085    {
00086     dir = RIGHT;
00087    }
00088    else
00089    {
00090     xinertia = -FOOB_WALK_SPEED;
00091    }
00092   }
00093 
00094   // walk animation
00095   if (animtimer > FOOB_WALK_ANIM_RATE)
00096   {
00097    animframe ^= 1;
00098    animtimer = 0;
00099   }
00100   else animtimer++;
00101   break;
00102 
00103  case FOOB_SPOOK:
00104   sprite = FOOB_SPOOK_FRAME;
00105 
00106   if (spooktimer > FOOB_SPOOK_SHOW_TIME)
00107   {
00108    state = FOOB_FLEE;
00109    OffOfSameLevelTime = 0;
00110    // run away from the offending player
00111    if (m_Player[SpookedByWho].getXPosition() < getXPosition())
00112     dir = RIGHT;
00113    else
00114     dir = LEFT;
00115    // in hard mode run TOWARDS the player (he's deadly in hard mode)
00116    if (mp_Map->m_Difficulty>1)
00117     dir = LEFT ? RIGHT : LEFT;
00118 
00119   }
00120   else spooktimer++;
00121   break;
00122 
00123  case FOOB_FLEE:
00124   // if player is off of the same level for FOOB_RELAX_TIME,
00125   // we can stop fleeing
00126   if (!onsamelevel)
00127   {
00128    if (OffOfSameLevelTime > FOOB_RELAX_TIME)
00129    {
00130     relax: ;
00131     state = FOOB_WALK;
00132     OnSameLevelTime = 0;
00133     break;
00134    }
00135    else OffOfSameLevelTime++;
00136   }
00137   else OffOfSameLevelTime = 0;
00138 
00139   if (dir == RIGHT)
00140   {  // walking right
00141    sprite = FOOB_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME + animframe;
00142    if (!blockedr)
00143    {
00144     xinertia = FOOB_FLEE_SPEED;
00145     blockedtime = 0;
00146    }
00147    else if ((mp_Map->m_Difficulty>1))
00148    {
00149     if (++blockedtime >= FOOB_HARDMODE_BLOCK_TIME)
00150     {
00151      blockedtime = 0;
00152      goto relax;
00153     }
00154    }
00155   }
00156   else
00157   {  // walking left
00158    sprite = FOOB_WALK_LEFT_FRAME + animframe;
00159    if (!blockedl)
00160    {
00161     xinertia = -FOOB_FLEE_SPEED;
00162     blockedtime = 0;
00163    }
00164    else if ((mp_Map->m_Difficulty>1))
00165    {
00166     if (++blockedtime >= FOOB_HARDMODE_BLOCK_TIME)
00167     {
00168      blockedtime = 0;
00169      goto relax;
00170     }
00171    }
00172   }
00173 
00174   // walk animation
00175   if (animtimer > FOOB_FLEE_ANIM_RATE)
00176   {
00177    animframe ^= 1;
00178    animtimer = 0;
00179   }
00180   else animtimer++;
00181   break;
00182 
00183  case FOOB_EXPLODE:
00184   // ahhhhh; I'm sorry.....you poor little thing......
00185   sprite = FOOB_EXPLODE_FRAME + animframe;
00186   if (sprite==FOOB_DEAD_FRAME)
00187   {
00188    state = FOOB_DEAD;
00189    dead = 1;
00190   }
00191   else
00192   {
00193    if (animtimer > FOOB_EXPLODE_ANIM_RATE)
00194    {
00195     animframe++;
00196     animtimer = 0;
00197    }
00198    else animtimer++;
00199   }
00200   break;
00201  }
00202 }
00203 
00204 void CFoob::getTouchedBy(CObject &theObject)
00205 {
00206  if(hitdetect(theObject))
00207  {
00208   if(theObject.m_type == OBJ_PLAYER)
00209   {
00210    CPlayer &Player = dynamic_cast<CPlayer&>(theObject);
00211    if(mp_Map->m_Difficulty>1)
00212     Player.kill();
00213   }
00214  }
00215 }
